Margaret Okayo (amụrụ na ọnwa Mee 30, na afọ 1976 na Masaba, Kisii District) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ marathon si Kenya
O meriri ọtụtụ nnukwu marathons, gụnyere New York City Marathon (ugboro abụọ), Boston Marathon, na London Marathon
O nwetakwala mmeri na San Diego Marathon ugboro abụọ.
Okayo malitere ịgba ọsọ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Itierio Secondary School, nke dị nso n'obodo Kisii, na afọ 1993
Ọ natara ọrụ site na Kenya Prisons Service, ebe obibi nke ndị na-agba ọsọ marathon nke ụmụ nwanyị kachasị elu na mba ahụ, na afọ 1995 ebe ọ zụlitere ọrụ ịgba ọsọ ya.
Na afọ 1998 Commonwealth Games ọ mechara nke ise na 10,000 mita
Ọ mechara nke iri na atọ na 1999 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships.
Otu n'ime agbụrụ ya kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma bụ mmeri na New York Marathon na afo 2001 na afọ 2003, Boston Marathon na 2002 na London Marathon na 2004
Ọ ka na-ejide ihe ndekọ na New York Marathon na Boston Marathon.
Marathons ndị ọzọ Okayo meriri gụnyere Milan na afọ 2003, San Diego na afọ 2000 na afo 2001
Ọ nọchitere anya obodo ya Kenya na afọ 2004 Summer Olympic Games na Athens, Gris, mana ọ gwụbeghị marathon ahụ
Ọ na-etinye ọnwa atọ nke ọzụzụ kwa afọ na Ịtali.
O meriri na 2003 Udine Half Marathon ma mechie nke atọ na afọ 2008 Rome-Ostia Half Marathon
Ọ bụ Federico Rosa na-achịkwa ya ma Gabriele Rosa na-azụ ya
Ọ dị naanị sentimita 152 n'ogologo ma dị kilogram 43 n'arọ.
